winter_desert.description: A Desert in Winter. Dry and sandy, with chunky hills, sparse vegetation and a generous helping of frost.....feast.

winter_temperate.description: Snow-topped Forests, and mountains, interweaved with rivers. A Majestic Winter Wonderland!

patterns.snow_covered_roof: Topped with a fresh layer of snow.

shivering_buff_3.description: Almost frozen. Get some warmth soon!

comfy_clothes_buff.description: Wearing comfy clothes that protect from the cold

warm_food_buff.description: Recently got a warm meal which protects a bit from the cold

open_present.description: Open the present and receive your well-earned gift!
